name: Kids Fun Tune
lyric:
Once there was a cat named nick
Tickled everybody with a hickery stick
When you try to catch him he will run away quick
He was a quick trick cat

Once there was a fly named steeve
He zipped up his shoulder and
He wiped it on his sleeve
Then he go and hide behind
A big old leaf
He was a dry sly fly

Once there was a mule named marty
The mocker made him pull around
The big head mccartney he said
The teacher couldn't invite him
To my class room party
He was a cool school mule

Once there was a hog named charlie
He took the cool spin on his poor
Dressed harley
He drove me to my car which then my hair
Got starry
He was a boggy soggy hoggy

Once there was a duck named hetty
Put butter on my steak and then
Jumped in to my spaghetti
And then he had a treat because the meat balls
Were ready he was a lucky luck ducky

Once there was a funny song
That everybody laughed and giggled all day long
Time is now right for me to say so long
I'll be soon to end up too
It's a funny song
And it didn't take long
Come on and sing along
It's a funny song
